Package io.nem.symbol.core.utils

Class ConvertUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.core.utils.ConvertUtils
  • public class ConvertUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that contains utility functions for converting hex strings to and from bytes.

        Parameters:
        input - the string input
        size - the expected hex size.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input is null, not an hex or it has an invalid size.
